summary: Three men living in the Eastern most island of China go on a road trip to the Western most end of the country, and facing crises of love, friendship, and faith on their journey to the West.
cast: Shaofeng Feng|Bo-lin Chen|Wallace Chung|Luodan Wang|Quan Yuan|Joe Chen|Zhangke Jia|Huayang Gao|Bai-Ke|Lianshun Kong|Haoran Wang|Qian Li|Xike Tang|Haitao Liu|Qinyun Jiang|Xinxing Li|Yueqi Luosha|Jike Liubo
title: Hou hui wu qi
